attributes.action: Give a George Medal to the Police Officer that defused the bomb in the Haymarket
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In a climate of terrorism I felt the Police officer who defused a smoking bomb by hand should be honoured for his bravery.
In a time when TV show produce so called hero's this officer showed the true definition of the word.

If you agree a George Medal or something similar should be awarded please join the petition
